ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would most definitely recommend the class! Modeling is an essential tool in political science and everyone in the field should have at least some working knowledge.
Yes, I would definitely recommend it.
Useful for understanding basic political models, definitely, but will require long hours and lots of frustration.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I was able to see what formal modelers/political economists actually do in this course. I hope to further my study by taking the microeconomics sequence next year.
I don't think the course taught me how to do modeling, but I am more prepared to read and understand papers that use modeling.
